results.title: Adverse events of concomitant use of immune checkpoint inhibitors and metformin or statin: an observational, retrospective disproportionality analysis.
results.text_hl: Amalgamated treatment of ICIs plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may heighten the likelihood of @DISEASE_Bone_Marrow_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D019046 @@@bone marrow aplasia@@@, @DISEASE_Inflammatory_Bowel_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D015212 @@@inflammatory bowel disease@@@, @DISEASE_Intestinal_Perforation @DISEASE_MESH:D007416 @@@intestinal perforation@@@, @DISEASE_Liver_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008107 @@@hepatic impairments@@@, @DISEASE_Sleep_Initiation_and_Maintenance_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D007319 @@@insomnia@@@, @DISEASE_Nephritis @DISEASE_MESH:D009393 @@@autoimmune nephritis@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Skin_Diseases_Eczematous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017443 @@@eczematous@@@ manifestations.

citations.NLM: Li W, Wang W. Adverse events of concomitant use of immune checkpoint inhibitors and metformin or statin: an observational, retrospective disproportionality analysis. Expert Opin Drug Saf. 2025 Apr 18;():1-10. PMID: 40232293
citations.BibTeX: @article{40232293, title={Adverse events of concomitant use of immune checkpoint inhibitors and metformin or statin: an observational, retrospective disproportionality analysis.}, author={Li W and Wang W}, journal={Expert Opin Drug Saf}, pages={1-10}}

results.title: [Photosensitivity induced by metformin: a report of 3 cases].

citations.NLM: Kastalli S, El Aïdli S, Chaabane A, Amrani R, Daghfous R, Belkahia C. [Photosensitivity induced by metformin: a report of 3 cases]. Tunis Med. 2009 Oct;87(10):703-5. PMID: 20187362

results.title: POLYGLANDULAR AUTOIMMUNE SYNDROME ASSOCIATED WITH MULTIPLE AUTOIMMUNE CONDITIONS AND ATOPIC DERMATITIS - AN UNUSUAL MANIFESTATION OF A POLYAUTOIMMUNITY PHENOTYPE.
results.text_hl: Recurrent flexural @<m>DISEASE_Skin_Diseases_Eczematous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017443 @@@eczematous rashes@@@, with negative epicutaneous tests but positive specific IgE tests for common allergens fulfilled the clinical criteria for the diagnosis of @DISEASE_Dermatitis_Atopic @DISEASE_MESH:D003876 @@@atopic dermatitis@@@.

citations.NLM: Forsea AM, Mihai C, Predescu T, Tudose I, Margaritescu I, Giurcaneanu C. POLYGLANDULAR AUTOIMMUNE SYNDROME ASSOCIATED WITH MULTIPLE AUTOIMMUNE CONDITIONS AND ATOPIC DERMATITIS - AN UNUSUAL MANIFESTATION OF A POLYAUTOIMMUNITY PHENOTYPE. Acta Endocrinol (Buchar). 2017 Jan-Mar;13(1):106-110. PMID: 31149156
